name: Ekklesia - Fall of the Watchers (Coming October 2022)
name_original: Ekklesia - Fall of the Watchers (Coming October 2022)
description:
"In the small mountain village of Eastborne, outbreaks of demonic attacks are growing increasingly prevalent.  

The sacred Divine order known as "Ekklesia" sends an emissary to investigate the cause of the attacks. 

However, the situation is much more dire than they could ever imagine..."

Ekklesia - Fall of the Watchers is the first original game by Cole Harmon. 

Fight your way through hordes of ghouls, hunt for secrets, and explore the mysterious catacombs in this micro "metroidvania" experience. 

Featuring a brilliant mix of classical, metal, electronic and ambient music, fans of the Castlevania series will absolutely love the original soundtrack. 

Time to beat: 30 minutes. 

Play in the dark, crank the volume. 

To support future games, consider buying the soundtrack here: https://coleharmon.bandcamp.com/

*Project releases October 2022*

Cover art: Aria Jarvis
